English: Use the command <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> at a terminal to locate the objective
Description: Don't localize QUERY. It's a command used in terminals in the game.

French.Translation: Utilisez la commande <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> dans un terminal pour localiser l'objectif.

Italian.Translation: Usare il comando <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> su un terminale per trovare l'obiettivo

German.Translation: Nutzen Sie den Befehl <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> an einem Terminal, um das Ziel zu lokalisieren.

Spanish.Translation: Usa el comando <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> en una terminal para localizar el objetivo.

Russian.Translation: Используйте команду <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> на терминале, чтобы найти цель.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Use o comando <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> em um terminal para localizar o objetivo.

Polish.Translation: Użyj polecenia <color=orange>QUERY[ALL_ITEMS]</color> w terminalu, żeby zlokalizować cel.

Japanese.Translation: 端末でコマンド <color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color> を使用して目標の位置を特定しろ

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 在終端使用指令<color=orange>QUERY[ALL_ITEMS]</color>來定位目標

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 在终端上使用命令<color=orange>QUERY [ALL_ITEMS]</color>以定位目标

name: WardenObjectiveData.RetrieveEssentialItemsMWP_Override.FindLocationInfo
